original_text: And of Kohath was the family of the Amramites, and the family of the Izeharites, and the family of the Hebronites, and the family of the Uzzielites: these are the families of the Kohathites.
korean_text: 고핫에게서는 아므람 종족과 이스할 종족과 헤브론 종족과 웃시엘 종족이 났으니 이들은 곧 고핫 종족들이라

sentences.original_text: And of Kohath was the family of the Amramites
and the family of the Izeharites
and the family of the Hebronites
and the family of the Uzzielites
these are the families of the Kohathites
